item.title: This drove Japanese animators to tears
item.description:
Spirit of Wonder: Miss Chinaâ€™s Ring and Spirit of Wonder: The Movie â€“ The Scientific Boys Club are hidden gems of 90s anime that most people havenâ€™t seenâ€”but absolutely should. This beautifully animated Japanese OVA series is packed with retro sci-fi aesthetics, stunning hand-drawn animation, and a story so moving that it supposedly drove Japanese editors and animators to tears.
In this video, I (Kenny Lauderdale) dive deep into Spirit of Wonder, its bizarre yet charming storytelling, and why it remains one of the most overlooked sci-fi anime masterpieces. Whether youâ€™re into steampunk anime, retro OVAs, or obscure anime gems, this one is worth a watch.
ğŸš€ What is Spirit of Wonder? Originally a manga by Kenji Tsuruta, this anime adaptation is split into two main stories: âœ¨ Miss Chinaâ€™s Ring (1992) â€“ A romantic and visually stunning short about Miss Chinaâ€™s frustration with an eccentric scientist. âœ¨ The Scientific Boys Club (2001) â€“ A group of elderly men finally pursue their childhood dream of space travel, resulting in one of the most poetic and nostalgic anime experiences ever animated.
ğŸ¥ This underrated anime OVA is proof that hand-drawn animation was at its peak in the 90s, delivering gorgeous art, fluid motion, and heartfelt storytelling. Itâ€™s the kind of anime that makes you sit back and appreciate the lost art of cel animation.
ğŸ”¹ Topics covered in this video: âœ”ï¸ Why Spirit of Wonder is a must-watch for sci-fi & steampunk anime fans âœ”ï¸ The animation quality that drove Japanese editors & animators to tears âœ”ï¸ How this anime blends romance, adventure, and old-school sci-fi âœ”ï¸ Miss Chinaâ€™s Ring vs. The Scientific Boys Club â€“ Which one is better? âœ”ï¸ Why Spirit of Wonder is one of the most underrated anime movies ever
ğŸ“¼ If you love rare anime, forgotten classics, and deep dives into lost animation history, subscribe for more Kenny Lauderdale content!
You can Support this channel here https://www.patreon.com/kennylauderdale Twitter (for fun posts & anime trivia) @KennyLauderdal3
0:00 Spirit of Wonder Miss China's Ring ğŸ’ 5:23 Spirit of Wonder Scientific Boys Club ğŸ“¼ 9:19 Memories of Emanon ğŸ“– 12:51 Kenji Tsuruta Lore ğŸ” 15:35 Closing Thoughts ( â€¢ Ì€Ï‰â€¢Ì )âœ§
Mal Description - Embark on a magical journey with Miss China and Dr. Breckinridge in "Spirit of Wonder" - an anime filled with whimsical adventures and charming characters. Join them as they explore the mysteries of shrinking technology, moon rocks, and scientific breakthroughs in this heartwarming series from the 1990s. Subscribe now for a delightful mix of comedy, romance, and intrigue!
#anime, #review, #japan
